815410.name: The Art of Shelter
815410.description:
Get a glimpse at the thoughts and concepts behind Shelter, Shelter 2, Paws, Fables From the Den, The Lonesome Fog, and Meadow. Flip through old and known images as well as others that have never been shown before. A must-have for any fan of the Shelter franchise.

About The Art of Shelter:


Main features
  • 75 spread digital art book
  • Original art from 7 different Shelter projects
  • Unlocks one unique skin for each animal (12 skins total)
  • Unlocks a special 3d-emote-esque sketch skin effect

To access the art book
  • Right-click Meadow in Steam and go to "Properties"
  • Select "Local Files"
  • Click "Browse Local Files"
  • Open the folder called "Art of Shelter"
815410.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 简体中文, 日语, 俄语, 瑞典语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 丹麦语, 波兰语, 匈牙利语, 阿拉伯语, 捷克语
